# Overview of VCE results


## Heritabilities
```{r, echo=FALSE}
### # Plot heritability
PositiveDefinit::plot_h2(psInputFile = ResultDF)
```


## Genetic correlations
```{r, echo=FALSE}
# Plot genetic correlations

```

## Variances

